en.hero_title:
Prepare for Psychiatry Fellowship
While on Break Shifts
en.hero_subtitle:
Simplified videos + Real-exam QBank + Short daily study plan.
Study with confidence... without getting lost in textbooks.
en.hero_points_1: 20â€“30 daily minutes, useful and light study rate
en.hero_points_2: Regular practice instead of getting lost in question papers
en.hero_points_3: Track your progress to know your weak points
en.intro_text:
Most prep methods are for people who are free... But you are a working doctor.
It's normal to feel lost using the wrong tools.
en.pain_1: Opening the textbook and feeling paralyzed?
en.pain_2: Work makes you feel there's no time to study?
en.pain_3: Don't know where to start to pass?
en.value_title: Psychiatry Notes turns Fellowship study from "Random Effort" to a Clear Daily System
en.value_desc: Watch right, solve right... Pass the exam.
en.wyg_video_desc:
Condensed simplified book explanation
Illustrations to ease studying
Discussion-style video format
Summary of any topic in 15 mins
en.wyg_book_desc:
Designed exactly for the Egyptian Fellowship curriculum
Integrated with extra QBank info
Digital book to study from anywhere
Order hard copy delivered to your door
en.wyg_qbank_desc:
Top banks where exams come from
Solved with explanations for right and wrong answers
Full and realistic exam simulation
Smart review for memorized or wrong questions
Study by topic and chapter to practice step-by-step
en.comp_old_points:
ğŸ˜µ Lost in textbooks
â° Wasted time on unfocused study
ğŸ” Same mistakes repeated
en.comp_new_points:
âœ… Clear daily plan
ğŸ¯ Video â†’ Book â†’ Questions
ğŸ“ Pass with confidence
en.hiw_title: How to use it?... In 3 steps
en.hiw_step_3:
Follow the plan:
Watch Video - Study Book - Solve QBank
en.price_free_desc: First week free to try and see if the system fits you.
en.faq_1_a: Yes, the first week is completely free with no credit card required. After that, you can subscribe (150 EGP/Month or 1200 EGP/Year). Cancel anytime.
en.faq_2_q: Do the questions match the real exam system?
en.faq_2_a: Yes, the QBank is designed to simulate the real exam environment (100 questions / 150 minutes).
en.faq_3_a: We have over 11,000 questions with detailed explanations, updated continuously.
en.faq_5_a: You can reach us via WhatsApp or Telegram links on the page.
en.faq_new_1_q: Is content a replacement for textbooks?
en.faq_new_1_a: It's not a literal replacement... but it extracts High-Yield material for the exam, letting you study smartly.
en.faq_new_2_a: The QBank is made to get you close to Exam Pattern: Topic-wise + Timed + Error Review.
en.faq_new_3_a: Yes â€” You will see completion rates + weak points + review recommendations.
en.final_title: If you've made it this far... this is for you
en.for_you: This course is for you if
en.chk_1: You want a single reliable source
en.chk_2: You want a plan to follow
en.chk_3: You want to enter the exam with confidence
en.trust_text: â˜… Trusted by over 2000 Doctors
en.popup_step1: Step 1: Download TestFlight from App Store
en.popup_tip: Pro tip: Copy the link before downloading TestFlight so you can easily return
en.apk_download_msg: Press OK to start the download... then check your notification bar or downloads list.
